Meet Petrina, Bryght's new Office Manager summer intern. Boris pontificates about our upcoming participation at DrupalCamp Toronto, BarCamp Tdot and the Mesh Conference and Richard (cutely as always) misses Karen. And lastly, I was wrong, YouTube only supports cameraphone upload by MMS which s*cks unlike the fantastic blip.tv which supports upload by email.
